org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue.MessageQueue

  • Packages that use MessageQueue 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hama.bsp.message
    Contains the implementation of message transfer.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue
    Contains all queue implementations.

      Classes in org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue that implement MessageQueue 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MemoryQueue<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      LinkedList backed queue structure for bookkeeping messages.
      class  SingleLockQueue<T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      A global mutex based synchronized queue.
      class  SortedMemoryQueue<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<M>>
      Heap (Java's priority queue) based message queue implementation that supports sorted receive and send.
